words.content_before: It’s crazy what scientists can do nowadays ! Can you believe it B.L. ?
words.content_link: A microchip was implemented to 450 volunteers.
words.content_after: They will be able to pay or take the subway only by using their hand !

words.content_before: They’re saying that we will soon be able to
words.content_link: control our connected house with our mind
words.content_after: ! It could even reduce my bills ! he says, laughing.

words.content: I find it so dehumanizing to implement me technologic materials inside our own body. What’s the purpose of paying with our hand?
I don’t know, it would be so much easier if everyone had one.
Having an only card could be enough. With their transhumanism, they are not modifying what’s around us but what’s inside us. But what’s the goal? Make us happier?

words.content_before: Of course ! Look, transhumanism is saving lots of lives. In medicine,
words.content_link: researcher are able to correct genetic anomalies and remove sick cells

words.content: At first look, it is. Except that we don’t think at what’s coming after.

Well if you can modify sick genes, it means that you can modify every type of genes. Things will get out of control. We will be able to choose the eye color of our childs, their gender, their hair or their strength. We will be able to increase their  mental aptitudes, make them stronger or smarter.
